Class GameOfLife

java.lang.Object
  GameOfLife

public class GameOfLife
extends java.lang.Object

Game of Life starter code. Demonstrates how to create and populate the game using the GridWorld framework. Also demonstrates how to provide accessor methods to make the class testable by unit tests.

Version:
18 July 2014
Author:
@gcschmit

Constructor for objects of class GameOfLife

Parameters:
ROWS2 - amount of rows the grid will contain COLS2 amount of columns the grid will contain choice selection of which preset you want x Offset of X axis y Offset of Y axis roll selection of whether rollover is active edit selection of whether you edit the grid before it starts
Method Detail

createNextGeneration

public void createNextGeneration()
Generates the next generation based on the rules of the Game of Life and updates the grid associated with the world

getActor

public info.gridworld.actor.Actor getActor(int row,
                                           int col)
Returns the actor at the specified row and column. Intended to be used for unit testing.

Parameters:
row - the row (zero-based index) of the actor to return
col - the column (zero-based index) of the actor to return
Returns:
the actor at the specified row and column
